```{r}
dryad <- read.csv(file = 'dryad_stats_3000.csv')
colnames(dryad)<-c("index","views", "downloads", "citations", "pub_date", "publisher", "id")
View(dryad)
```


```{r}
dryad$views<-gsub(" views","", dryad$views)
dryad$downloads<-gsub(" downloads","", dryad$downloads)
dryad$citations<-gsub(" citations","", dryad$citations)
dryad$pub_date<-gsub("Publication date: ","", dryad$pub_date)

dryad$views<-as.numeric(dryad$views)
dryad$downloads<-as.numeric(dryad$downloads)
dryad$citations<-as.numeric(dryad$citations)
dryad$pub_date<-mdy(dryad$pub_date)


View(dryad)
```

```{r}
dryad_num<-c("views", "downloads", "citations")
d = cor(dryad[dryad_num])
corrplot(d, method= 'number')
```
```{r}
ggplot(dryad, aes(x=downloads, y=views)) + geom_line()
```


```{r}
ggplot(data = dryad, aes(x = pub_date, y = downloads)) +
   geom_line(aes(size=views),color = "#FC4E07")

ggplot(data = dryad, aes(x = pub_date, y=views)) +
  geom_count(color = "#E57200") + ggtitle("Downloads of Datasets Published to Dryad Over Time") +
  xlab("Date") + ylab("Number of ") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))
  
```
```{r}
print("averages")
mean(dryad$downloads)
mean(dryad$views)
mean(dryad$citations)

print("summary")
summary(dryad$downloads)
summary(dryad$views)
summary(dryad$citations)
summary(dryad$citations)

```
```{r}
hist(dryad$downloads)
```
